siteMetadata.title: Product Hunt 热门
siteMetadata.author: Buzzing.cc
siteMetadata.description: 用中文浏览 Product Hunt 热门App，网站和产品

blogPost.excerpt: Hypnos is a digital sleep journal that helps you discover how your habits impact your sleep. It does this by taking in your mood, daily activities and pairing it with data from your sleep tracker. Delivering insights on how to improve your sleep and habits.
blogPost.body: Hypnos is a digital sleep journal that helps you discover how your habits impact your sleep. It does this by taking in your mood, daily activities and pairing it with data from your sleep tracker. Delivering insights on how to improve your sleep and habits.
blogPost.title: Hypnos - A sleep journal that helps you get better sleep.
blogPost.author: Lindsay Amos

localize.description: Hypnos是一本数字睡眠日志，可以帮助你发现你的习惯是如何影响你的睡眠的。它通过记录你的情绪、日常活动，并将其与你的睡眠跟踪器中的数据配对来做到这一点。提供关于如何改善睡眠和习惯的见解。
localize.tagline: 一本帮助你获得更好睡眠的睡眠日记。

localize.description: Hypnos是一本數字睡眠日誌，可以幫助你發現你的習慣是如何影響你的睡眠的。它通過記錄你的情緒、日常活動，並將其與你的睡眠跟蹤器中的數據配對來做到這一點。提供關於如何改善睡眠和習慣的見解。
localize.tagline: 一本幫助你獲得更好睡眠的睡眠日記。

previous.excerpt: Mock Magic is an intentionally simple way to create beautiful mockups for your design or product.
previous.title: MockMagic - A simple, free mockup generator

localize.description: Mock Magic是一种特意简单的方式，可以为您的设计或产品创建漂亮的样机。
localize.tagline: 一个简单的、免费的模型生成器

localize.description: Mock Magic是一種特意簡單的方式，可以爲您的設計或產品創建漂亮的樣機。
localize.tagline: 一個簡單的、免費的模型生成器
